After losing his first two games with his new team, that wasn't the case with this victory. Allen Iverson had 30 points, nine assists and provided a spark for Detroit after a slow start, winning his first game since joining the Pistons, 100-92 over the Sacramento Kings on Tuesday night. inaugural, National Review Online spoke with Mike Pence about the Gipper, asking what his legacy means to him and the GOP. " Ronald Reagan is the reason I'm a Republican," Mike Pence tells us. I was active in local Democratic politics when I was a teenager in Columbus, Indiana. Then I started to hear the voice of a B-movie actor, turned governor, turned candidate. He gave voice to the ideals and values that I was raised to believe in. Republicans, Mike Pence continues, should learn from how Ronald Reagan led. "I am convinced he is now going to run for governor," said Mike McDaniel , a former state Republican chairman. The 51-year-old Mr. Mike Pence is a darling of social conservatives and often describes himself as a Christian, a conservative, and a Republican, in that order. He had made multiple trips to states that host early presidential primary contests. Mr. Mike McDaniel said the decision not to run must have been difficult. "He had a lot of people around the

went back and forth in our heads, we never went back and forth in our hearts." Saying his "heart was in Indiana," Mike Pence said he would continue to meet with the good and strong and opinionated people of this state before deciding his next move. During a question-and-answer session, Mike Pence said his proudest moment as a congressman came when he helped a Muncie mother avoid deportation to her home country of Sierra Leone.
